summary: In the sprint review meeting, Sarah provided detailed instructions to the client on how to set up and test the latest app sprint (SP-003) featuring consolidated SQLite setup, mock login, employee add/search. She requested feedback on completed user stories and inquired about preferred demo items.

actions.task: Test the app by following the provided setup and testing steps, then share feedback on completed stories (US-017, US-010, US-015, US-001)
